queries.name: Next steps from owned (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a {owned: true})-[*1..3]->(b)) WHERE a<>b RETURN p

queries.name: Next steps from owned (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a {owned: true})-[*1..5]->(b)) WHERE a<>b RETURN p

queries.name: All next steps from owned (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = allShortestPaths((a {owned: true})-[*1..3]->(b)) WHERE a<>b RETURN p

queries.name: All next steps from owned (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = allShortestPaths((a {owned: true})-[*1..5]->(b)) WHERE a<>b RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from owned to high value targets (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a {owned: true})-[*1..5]->(b {highvalue: true})) WHERE a<>b RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from owned to high value targets (unlimited)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a {owned: true})-[*1..]->(b {highvalue: true})) WHERE a<>b RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from owned to tier 0 (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a {owned: true})-[*1..5]->(b {tier0: true})) WHERE a<>b RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from owned to tier 0 (unlimited)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a {owned: true})-[*1..]->(b {tier0: true})) WHERE a<>b RETURN p

queries.name: All high value targets

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a)-[:Contains*1..]->({highvalue: true}) WHERE (a:Domain or a:AZTenant) RETURN p

queries.name: All owned objects

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a)-[:Contains|AZContains*1..]->({owned: true}) WHERE (a:Domain OR a:AZTenant) RETURN p

queries.name: All sessions

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(:User) RETURN p

queries.name: Sessions of valuable users (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(:User {highvalue: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Sessions on outdated computers

queryList.query: MATCH p = (u:User)<-[:HasSession]-(c:Computer) WHERE c.operatingsystem =~ '(?i)Windows.*?(2000|2003|2008|xp|vista|7|me).*?' RETURN p

queries.name: Sessions of specific user

queryList.title: Select user...
queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {enabled: true}) RETURN u.name ORDER BY u.name
MATCH p = (:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(:User {name: $result}) RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled certificate templates

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true})-[:EnabledBy]->(:CA) RETURN p UNION MATCH p = shortestPath((o)-[r]->(t:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true})) WHERE o<>t RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from owned to ADCS (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((o {owned: true})-[*1..10]->(t:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true})) WHERE o<>t RETURN p UNION MATCH p = shortestPath((o {owned: true})-[r*1..10]->(a:CA)) WHERE o<>a AND none(rel IN r WHERE rel:EnabledBy OR rel:Read) RETURN p

queries.name: ADCS tiering violations (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((o)-[r]->(t:CA)) WHERE o<>t AND none(e IN r WHERE e:Enroll OR e:Read OR e:EnabledBy) AND NOT coalesce(o.tier0, false) RETURN p UNION MATCH p = shortestPath((o)-[r]->(t:CertificateTemplate)) WHERE o<>t AND NOT coalesce(o.tier0, false) AND none(e IN r WHERE e:Enroll OR e:AutoEnroll) AND (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) RETURN p

queries.name: Direct paths to ESC1 templates excluding tier 0

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[r]->(t:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true, `Client Authentication`: true, `Enrollee Supplies Subject`: true, `Requires Manager Approval`: false}) WHERE NOT coalesce(o.tier0, false) AND (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND (r:Enroll OR r:AutoEnroll) RETURN p

queries.name: Direct paths to ESC2 templates excluding tier 0

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[r]->(t:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true, `Any Purpose`: true, `Requires Manager Approval`: false}) WHERE NOT coalesce(o.tier0, false) AND (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND (r:Enroll OR r:AutoEnroll) RETURN p

queries.name: Direct paths to ESC3 templates excluding tier 0

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[r]->(t:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true, `Enrollment Agent`: true, `Requires Manager Approval`: false}) WHERE NOT coalesce(o.tier0, false) AND (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND (r:Enroll OR r:AutoEnroll) RETURN p

queries.name: Direct paths to ESC4 templates excluding tier 0

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[r]->(t:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true}) WHERE NOT coalesce(o.tier0, false) AND (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND NOT (r:EnabledBy OR r:Read OR r:ManageCa OR r:ManageCertificates OR r:Enroll OR r:AutoEnroll) RETURN p

queries.name: Certificate authorities with ESC6

queryList.query: MATCH (a:CA {`User Specified SAN`: 'Enabled'}) RETURN a

queries.name: Direct paths to ESC7 certificate authorities

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[r]->(a:CA) WHERE (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND NOT (r:EnabledBy OR r:Read OR r:Enroll OR r:AutoEnroll) RETURN p

queries.name: Certificate authorities with ESC8

queryList.query: MATCH (a:CA {`Web Enrollment`: 'Enabled'}) RETURN a

queries.name: Direct paths to ESC8 templates

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[:Enroll]->(:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true,`Client Authentication`:true})-[:EnabledBy]->(:CA {`Web Enrollment`:'Enabled'}) WHERE (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) RETURN p

queries.name: Direct paths to ESC9 templates

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[r]->(t:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true, `Client Authentication`: true}) WHERE 'NoSecurityExtension' IN t.`Enrollment Flag` AND (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND NOT (r:EnabledBy OR r:Read OR r:ManageCa OR r:ManageCertificates) RETURN p

queries.name: Certificate authorities with ESC11

queryList.query: MATCH (a:CA {`Enforce Encryption for Requests`: 'Disabled', `Request Disposition`: 'Issue'}) RETURN a

queries.name: Direct paths to ESC11 templates

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[:Enroll]->(:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true,`Client Authentication`: true})-[:EnabledBy]->(:CA {`Enforce Encryption for Requests`: 'Disabled', `Request Disposition`: 'Issue'}) WHERE (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from unprivileged groups to valueable targets (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (g:Group)-[r*1..3]->(b {highvalue: true}) WHERE none(e IN r WHERE e:Enroll OR e:AutoEnroll) AND (g.objectid ENDS WITH '-S-1-1-0' OR g.objectid ENDS WITH '-S-1-5-11' OR g.objectid ENDS WITH '-513' OR g.objectid ENDS WITH '-515') RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from unprivileged groups (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (g:Group)-[r*1..3]->(b) WHERE none(e IN r WHERE e:Enroll OR e:AutoEnroll) AND (g.objectid ENDS WITH '-S-1-1-0' OR g.objectid ENDS WITH '-S-1-5-11' OR g.objectid ENDS WITH '-513' OR g.objectid ENDS WITH '-515') RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from users to valueable targets excluding tier 0 (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a:User {enabled: true})-[*1..3]->(b {highvalue: true}) WHERE NOT coalesce(a.tier0, false) RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from users excluding tier 0 (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a:User {enabled: true})-[*1..3]->(b) WHERE NOT coalesce(a.tier0, false) RETURN p

queries.name: Users with local admin rights excluding tier 0 (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (u:User {enabled: true})-[:AdminTo]->(:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT coalesce(u.tier0, false) RETURN p UNION MATCH p = (u:User {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..10]->(:Group)-[:AdminTo]->(:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT coalesce(u.tier0, false) RETURN p

queries.name: Users with local execution rights excluding tier 0 (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (u:User {enabled: true})-[:AdminTo|CanRDP|ExecuteDCOM|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|WriteAccountRestrictions|MemberOf*1..10]->(:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT coalesce(u.tier0, false) RETURN p

queries.name: LAPS readers excluding tier 0 (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (u:User {enabled: true})-[:ReadLAPSPassword|SyncLAPSPassword|GenericAll|AllExtendedRights|MemberOf*1..10]->(:Computer {enabled: true, haslaps: true}) WHERE NOT coalesce(u.tier0, false) RETURN p

queries.name: gMSA readers excluding tier 0 (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (u:User {enabled: true})-[:ReadGMSAPassword|MemberOf*1..10]->(:User {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT coalesce(u.tier0, false) RETURN p

queries.name: Objects with DCSync rights excluding tier 0 (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o {enabled: true})-[:DCSync|AllExtendedRights|GenericAll|MemberOf*1..10]->(:Domain) WHERE (o:User OR o:Computer) AND NOT coalesce(o.tier0, false) RETURN p

queries.name: Users that can reset passwords excluding tier 0 (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (u:User {enabled: true})-[:ForceChangePassword|MemberOf*1..10]->(:User {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT coalesce(u.tier0, false) RETURN p

queries.name: Users that can add members to groups excluding tier 0 (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:User {enabled: true})-[:AddMember|MemberOf*1..10]->(:Group) WHERE NOT coalesce(u.tier0, false) RETURN p

queries.name: DACL tiering violations

queryList.query: MATCH p = (x {enabled: true})-[r]->(y) WHERE NOT coalesce(x.tier0, false) AND y.tier0=true AND NOT r:SharesPasswordWith RETURN p

queries.name: Object ownership excluding tier 0

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a)-[:Owns]->(b) WHERE NOT coalesce(a.tier0, false) RETURN p

queries.name: Objects with potential password in description

queryList.query: MATCH (x) WHERE toLower(x.description) CONTAINS 'passw' OR toLower(x.description) CONTAINS 'kennw' OR toUpper(x.description) CONTAINS 'pw:' RETURN x

queries.name: Users or computers with custom SPNs

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c {enabled: true}) WHERE ANY (x IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE NOT toUpper(x) STARTS WITH 'HOST/' AND NOT x STARTS WITH 'WSMAN/' AND NOT x STARTS WITH 'RestrictedKrbHost/' AND NOT x STARTS WITH 'TERMSRV/' AND NOT x STARTS WITH 'DNS/' AND NOT x STARTS WITH 'GC/' AND NOT toUpper(x) STARTS WITH 'LDAP/' AND NOT x STARTS WITH 'MSSQLSvc/' AND NOT x STARTS WITH 'MSServerCluster/' AND NOT x STARTS WITH 'MSClusterVirtualServer/' AND NOT x STARTS WITH 'MSServerClusterMgmtAPI/') RETURN p

queries.name: Potential pre-created computers

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE (c.lastlogon=0 OR c.lastlogon IS NULL) RETURN c

queries.name: Paths from outside tier 0 to disabled users

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a)-[r]->(b:User {enabled: false}) WHERE NOT a.tier0 AND r.isacl RETURN p

queries.name: Computers with local admin rights (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Computer {enabled: true})-[:AdminTo]->(:Computer {enabled: true}) RETURN p UNION MATCH p = (:Computer {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..10]->(:Group)-[:AdminTo]->(:Computer {enabled: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Computers without SMB signing

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(:Computer {enabled: true, smbsigning: false}) RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from computers excluding tier 0 (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a:Computer {enabled: true})-[r*1..3]->(b) WHERE a<>b AND none(e in r where e:Contains OR e:HasSession OR e:Enroll OR e:AutoEnroll) AND NOT coalesce(a.tier0, false) RETURN p

queries.name: Kerberoastable users

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true, hasspn: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: AS-REP-roastable users

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(:User {enabled: true, dontreqpreauth: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Unconstrained delegations excluding tier 0

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(a {enabled: true, unconstraineddelegation: true}) WHERE NOT coalesce(a.tier0, false) RETURN p

queries.name: Constrained delegations excluding tier 0

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a)-[:AllowedToDelegate]->(b) WHERE NOT coalesce(a.tier0, false)  RETURN p

queries.name: Constrained delegations with protocol transition excluding tier 0

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(a {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT a.allowedtodelegate IS NULL AND a.trustedtoauth=true AND NOT coalesce(a.tier0, false) RETURN p

queries.name: Constrained delegations without protocol transition excluding tier 0

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(a {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT a.allowedtodelegate IS NULL AND a.trustedtoauth=false AND NOT coalesce(a.tier0, false) RETURN p

queries.name: Resource-based constrained delegations excluding tier 0

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a)-[:AllowedToAct|AddAllowedToAct]->(b) WHERE NOT coalesce(a.tier0, false) RETURN p

queries.name: Tier 0 users that can be delegated

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {enabled: true, sensitive: false, tier0: true}) RETURN u

queries.name: Linux servers potentially vulnerable to account name spoofing

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT c.operatingsystem STARTS WITH 'Windows' AND NOT c.operatingsystem STARTS WITH 'Mac OS X' AND c.operatingsystem<>'macOS' AND NOT c.operatingsystem STARTS WITH 'NetApp' AND c.operatingsystem<>'OnTap' AND c.operatingsystem<>'Cisco Identity Services Engine' RETURN p

queries.name: GPO tiering violations

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a)-[]->(:GPO)-[:GPLink]->(b) WHERE (((a:User OR a:Computer) AND a.enabled) OR a:Group) AND (b:OU OR b:Domain) AND NOT coalesce(a.tier0, false) AND b.tier0 RETURN p

queries.name: Direct paths to GPOs excluding tier 0

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a)-[]->(b:GPO)) WHERE a<>b AND (((a:User OR a:Computer) AND a.enabled) OR a:Group) AND NOT coalesce(a.tier0, false) RETURN p

queries.name: OUs containing users (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..10]->(o:OU) MATCH (o)-[:Contains*1..10]->(:User) RETURN p

queries.name: OUs containing computers (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..10]->(o:OU) MATCH (o)-[:Contains*1..10]->(:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Domains and OUs (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..5]->(:OU) RETURN p

queries.name: GPOs and OUs

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:GPO)-[:GPLink]->(a) WHERE a:OU OR a:Domain RETURN p

queries.name: MSSQL servers

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c {enabled: true}) WHERE ANY (x IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE x STARTS WITH 'MSSQLSvc/' OR x STARTS WITH 'MSServerCluster/' OR x STARTS WITH 'MSClusterVirtualServer/' OR x STARTS WITH 'MSServerClusterMgmtAPI/') RETURN p UNION MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true})<-[:SQLAdmin]-(o) WHERE (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) RETURN p

queries.name: MSSQL admins

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[:SQLAdmin]->(:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) RETURN p

queries.name: Users that are member of a foreign group (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (u:User)-[:MemberOf*1..10]->(g:Group) WHERE u.domain<>g.domain RETURN p

queries.name: Users with same name in different domain

queryList.query: MATCH (u1:User), (u2:User) WHERE split(u1.name,'@')[0]=split(u2.name,'@')[0] AND u1.domain<>u2.domain AND toInteger(split(u1.objectid,'-')[7])>=1000 RETURN u1

queries.name: Cross-domain object ownership

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a)-[:Owns]->(b) WHERE a.domainsid<>b.domainsid RETURN p

queries.name: Cross-domain ACLs

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a)-[r]->(b) WHERE a.domainsid<>b.domainsid AND r.isacl RETURN p

queries.name: Cross-domain paths

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a)-[]->(b) WHERE a.domainsid<>b.domainsid RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from objects in owned domains to other domains

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain {owned: true})-[:Contains*1..]->(a)-[]->(b)<-[Contains*1..]-(:Domain {owned: false}) RETURN p

queries.name: Tier 0 users that never logged on

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true, tier0: true}) WHERE u.lastlogontimestamp IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled users that never logged on

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE u.lastlogontimestamp IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN p

queries.name: Tier 0 users without logon since 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true, tier0: true}) WHERE NOT u.lastlogon IN [-1.0, 0.0] AND datetime().epochseconds - u.lastlogon > 90*60*60*24 RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled users without logon since 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT u.lastlogon IN [-1.0, 0.0] AND datetime().epochseconds - u.lastlogon > 90*60*60*24 RETURN p

queries.name: Tier 0 users that never set a password

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true, tier0: true}) WHERE u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled users that never set a password

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN p

queries.name: Tier 0 users without password change since a year

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true, tier0: true}) WHERE NOT u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] AND datetime().epochseconds - u.pwdlastset > 60*60*24*365 RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled users without password change since a year

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] AND datetime().epochseconds - u.pwdlastset > 60*60*24*365 RETURN p

queries.name: Tier 0 users with password change after last logon

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true, tier0: true}) WHERE (u.lastlogon > 0 AND u.lastlogon >= u.lastlogontimestamp AND u.pwdlastset > u.lastlogon) OR (u.lastlogontimestamp > 0 AND u.lastlogontimestamp >= u.lastlogon AND u.pwdlastset > u.lastlogontimestamp) RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled users with password change after last logon

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE (u.lastlogon > 0 AND u.lastlogon >= u.lastlogontimestamp AND u.pwdlastset > u.lastlogon) OR (u.lastlogontimestamp > 0 AND u.lastlogontimestamp >= u.lastlogon AND u.pwdlastset > u.lastlogontimestamp) RETURN p

queries.name: Tier 0 users with password not required

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(:User {enabled: true, tier0: true, passwordnotreqd: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled users with password not required

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(:User {enabled: true, passwordnotreqd: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Tier 0 users with never expiring passwords

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(:User {enabled: true, tier0: true, pwdneverexpires: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled users with never expiring passwords

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(:User {enabled: true, pwdneverexpires: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled members of dangerous groups (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (u:User {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..5]->(g:Group) WHERE g.name=~'(?i)(ACCOUNT OPERATORS|SERVER OPERATORS|SCHEMA ADMINS|DNSADMINS)@.*?' RETURN p

queries.name: Direct members of pre-windows 2000 compatible access group

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group) WHERE g.name STARTS WITH 'PRE-WINDOWS 2000 COMPATIBLE ACCESS@' RETURN p

queries.name: Tier 0 users that are not protected (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..5]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-525' WITH COLLECT(u) AS x MATCH (u:User {enabled: true, tier0: true}) WHERE NOT u IN x RETURN u

queries.name: Disabled users

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(:User {enabled: false}) RETURN p

queries.name: Active computers with unsupported OS

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE c.operatingsystem =~ '(?i)Windows.*?(2000|2003|2008|2012|me|xp|vista|7|8).*?' AND NOT c.lastlogon IN [-1.0, 0.0] AND datetime().epochseconds - c.lastlogon > 90*60*60*24 RETURN p

queries.name: Active computers without LAPS excluding DCs (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer)-[:MemberOf*1..10]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-516' WITH COLLECT(c) AS x MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true, haslaps: false}) WHERE NOT c IN x AND c.operatingsystem STARTS WITH 'Windows' AND NOT c.lastlogon IN [-1.0, 0.0] AND datetime().epochseconds - c.lastlogon > 90*60*60*24 RETURN p

queries.name: Tier 0 computers without logon

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true, tier0: true}) WHERE c.lastlogon IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled computers without logon

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE c.lastlogon IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN p

queries.name: Tier 0 computers without logon since 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true, tier0: true}) WHERE NOT c.lastlogon IN [-1.0, 0.0] AND datetime().epochseconds - c.lastlogon > 90*60*60*24 RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled computers without logon since 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT c.lastlogon IN [-1.0, 0.0] AND datetime().epochseconds - c.lastlogon > 90*60*60*24 RETURN p

queries.name: Disabled computers

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: false})

queries.name: Connect uses with shared passwords

queryList.query: MATCH (a:User) MATCH (b:User) WHERE a<>b AND NOT a.nthash IS NULL AND a.nthash=b.nthash MERGE (a)-[:SharesPasswordWith]-(b)

queries.name: Paths from cracked passwords excluding tier 0 (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a {enabled: true, cracked: true})-[*1..3]->(b)) WHERE a<>b AND ((a:User OR a:Computer) AND a.enabled) AND NOT coalesce(a.tier0, false) RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from kerberoasted users (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a:User {enabled: true, hasspn: true, cracked: true})-[*1..3]->(b)) WHERE a<>b RETURN p

queries.name: Tier 0 users with cracked password

queryList.query: MATCH p = (u:User {enabled: true, cracked: true})-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group) WHERE u.tier0 OR g.tier0 RETURN p

queries.name: Valuable users with cracked password

queryList.query: MATCH p = (u:User {enabled: true, cracked: true})-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group) WHERE u.highvalue OR g.highvalue RETURN p

queries.name: Tier 0 users with shared password

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a:User {enabled: true})-[:SharesPasswordWith]->(b: User {enabled: true, tier0: true}) WHERE a.tier0 IS NULL OR a.tier0=false RETURN p

queries.name: Valueable users with shared password

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a:User {enabled: true})-[:SharesPasswordWith]->(b: User {enabled: true, highvalue: true}) WHERE a.highvalue IS NULL OR a.highvalue=false RETURN p

queries.name: Users where password equals username

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE toLower(u.samaccountname)=toLower(u.password) SET u.weakpassword=true RETURN u

queries.name: Users with empty password

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {enabled: true, nthash: '31d6cfe0d16ae931b73c59d7e0c089c0'}) SET u.weakpassword=true RETURN u

queries.name: Users with passwords up to 4 chars

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE size(u.password) <= 4 SET u.weakpassword=true RETURN u

queries.name: Users with passwords up to 8 chars

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE size(u.password) <= 8 SET u.weakpassword=true RETURN u

queries.name: Users with password in description

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE u.password IS NOT NULL AND u.description CONTAINS u.password RETURN u

queries.name: Pre-created Computers

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE c.password=toLower(left(replace(c.samaccountname, '$', ''), 14)) SET c.weakpassword=true RETURN c

queries.name: Mark Tier 0 users (1/1)

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.name STARTS WITH 'MSOL_' SET u.tier0=true, u.highvalue=true RETURN u

queries.name: Mark Tier 0 groups (1/3)

queryList.query: MATCH (x:Group) WHERE any(y IN [512, 516, 517, 518, 519, 526, 527] WHERE x.objectid ENDS WITH '-' + toString(y)) SET x.highvalue=true, x.tier0=true RETURN x

queries.name: Mark Tier 0 groups (2/3)

queryList.query: MATCH (x:Group) WHERE any(y IN ['S-1-5-32-544', 'S-1-5-32-548', 'S-1-5-32-549', 'S-1-5-32-550', 'S-1-5-32-551', 'S-1-5-9'] WHERE x.objectid ENDS WITH '-' + y) SET x.highvalue=true, x.tier0=true RETURN x

queries.name: Mark Tier 0 groups (3/3)

queryList.query: MATCH (x:Group) WHERE any(y IN ['DnsAdmins'] WHERE x.name STARTS WITH toUpper(y + '@')) SET x.highvalue=true, x.tier0=true RETURN x

queries.name: Mark members of Tier 0 groups (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (x)-[:MemberOf*1..3]->(y:Group {tier0: true}) WHERE (x:Group OR x:User OR x:Computer) SET x.highvalue=true, x.tier0=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark members of Tier 0 groups (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (x)-[:MemberOf*1..10]->(y:Group {tier0: true}) WHERE (x:Group OR x:User OR x:Computer) SET x.highvalue=true, x.tier0=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark members of valueable groups (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (x)-[:MemberOf*1..3]->(y:Group {highvalue: true}) WHERE (x:Group OR x:User OR x:Computer) SET x.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark members of valueable groups (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (x)-[:MemberOf*1..10]->(y:Group {highvalue: true}) WHERE (x:Group OR x:User OR x:Computer) SET x.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark OUs containing Tier 0 objects

queryList.query: MATCH p = (x:OU)-[:Contains*1..]->(y {tier0: true}) WHERE (y:OU OR y:Group OR y:User OR y:Computer) SET x.highvalue=true, x.tier0=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark OUs containing valueable objects

queryList.query: MATCH p = (x:OU)-[:Contains*1..]->(y {highvalue: true}) WHERE (y:OU OR y:Group OR y:User OR y:Computer) SET x.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark objects with unconstrained delegation

queryList.query: MATCH (o {enabled:true, unconstraineddelegation:true}) SET o.highvalue=true RETURN o

queries.name: Mark computers with sessions of valuable users

queryList.query: MATCH p = (x:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(y:User {highvalue: true}) SET x.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark objects in direct control of valuable objects

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((x)-[]->(y {highvalue: true})) WHERE x<>y SET x.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark users and computers in control of valuable objects (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((x)-[*1..3]->(y {highvalue: true})) WHERE x<>y AND (x:User OR x:Computer) SET x.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark users and computers in control of valuable objects (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((x)-[*1..5]->(y {highvalue: true})) WHERE x<>y AND (x:User OR x:Computer) SET x.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: User and groups with admincount that are not high value (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[:MemberOf*1..3]->(g:Group) WHERE (((o:User OR o:Computer) AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND NOT o.highvalue AND NOT o.admincount RETURN o LIMIT 500

queries.name: Potential admins (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(g:Group)<-[:MemberOf*1..10]-(u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE toUpper(g.name) CONTAINS 'ADM' OR toUpper(u.name) CONTAINS 'ADM' RETURN p

queries.name: Members of protected users (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:User {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..10]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-525' RETURN p

queries.name: Show Tier 0

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(y {tier0: true}) RETURN p UNION MATCH (p {tier0: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Show valuable objects

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(y {highvalue: true}) RETURN p UNION MATCH (p {highvalue: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Show users and computers violating Tier 0 (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((x)-[*1..5]->(y:Domain)) WHERE x<>y AND (x:User OR x:Computer) AND (x.tier0=false OR x.tier0 IS NULL) RETURN p

queries.name: Show users and computers violating Tier 0 (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((x)-[*1..10]->(y:Domain)) WHERE x<>y AND (x:User OR x:Computer) AND (x.tier0=false OR x.tier0 IS NULL) RETURN p

queries.name: Mark tier 0 roles

queryList.query: MATCH (r:AZRole) WHERE r.displayname =~ '(?i)Application Administrator|Cloud Application Administrator|Directory Synchronization Accounts|Global Administrator|Intune Administrator|Privileged Authentication Administrator|Privileged Role Administrator|User Administrator' SET r.tier0=true, r.highvalue=true RETURN r

queries.name: Mark valueable roles

queryList.query: MATCH (r:AZRole) WHERE r.displayname =~ '(?i)Application Developer|Authentication Administrator|Authentication Policy Administrator|Cloud Device Administrator|Conditional Access Administrator|Directory Writers|Exchange Administrator|Global Reader|Helpdesk Administrator|Hybrid Identity Administrator|Password Administrator|Security Administrator' SET r.highvalue=true RETURN r

queries.name: Mark users in tier 0 roles (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (u)-[:AZHasRole|AZMemberOf*1..10]->(r:AZRole) WHERE r.tier0 SET u.tier0=true, u.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark users in valueable roles (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (u)-[:AZHasRole|AZMemberOf*1..10]->(r:AZRole) WHERE r.highvalue SET u.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark owners of subscriptions as tier 0

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n)-[:AZOwns|AZUserAccessAdministrator]->(s:AZSubscription) SET n.tier0=true, n.highvalue=true, s.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark service principals with valueable MS Graph app role assignments

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a:AZServicePrincipal)-[:AZMGAppRoleAssignment_ReadWrite_All|AZMGApplication_ReadWrite_All|AZMGDirectory_ReadWrite_All|AZMGGroupMember_ReadWrite_All|AZMGOrganization_ReadWrite_All|AZMGPolicy_ReadWrite_AuthenticationMethod|AZMGPolicy_ReadWrite_AuthenticationMethod|AZMGRoleManagement_ReadWrite_Directory|AZMGServicePrincipalEndpoint_ReadWrite_All|AZMGUserAuthenticationMethod_ReadWrite_All|AZMGUser_ManageIdentities_All|AZMGUser_ReadWrite_All]->(b:AZServicePrincipal) WHERE b.name STARTS WITH 'MICROSOFT GRAPH@' SET a.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark apps that are running as tier 0 service principal

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a:AZApp)-[:AZRunsAs]->(:AZServicePrincipal {tier0: true}) SET a.tier0=true, a.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark apps that are running as valueable service principal

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a:AZApp)-[:AZRunsAs]->(:AZServicePrincipal {highvalue: true}) SET a.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark owners of tier 0 applications

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a)-[:AZOwns]->(:AZApp {tier0: true}) SET a.tier0=true, a.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark owners of valueable applications

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a)-[:AZOwns]->(:AZApp {highvalue: true}) SET a.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark owners of any application as valueable

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n)-[:AZOwns]->(:AZApp) SET n.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Principals without Azure role but with RBAC role User Access Administrator (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH (u) WHERE NOT EXISTS((u)-[:AZMemberOf|AZHasRole*1..10]->(:AZRole)) AND EXISTS((u)-[:AZUserAccessAdministrator]->()) RETURN u

queries.name: Paths into tier 0 (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a)-[r*1..10]->(b {tier0: true})) WHERE a<>b AND (NOT a.tier0 OR a.tier0 IS NULL) RETURN p

queries.name: Paths to valueable targets (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a)-[r*1..10]->(b {highvalue: true})) WHERE a<>b AND (NOT a.highvalue OR a.highvalue IS NULL) RETURN p

queries.name: Paths to high value roles (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((m)-[*1..10]->(n:AZRole)) WHERE n.displayname =~ '(?i)Global Administrator|User Administrator|Cloud Application Administrator|Authentication Policy Administrator|Exchange Administrator|Helpdesk Administrator|Privileged Authentication Administrator' AND NOT m = n RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from applications to high value targets (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((m:AZApp)-[r*1..10]->(n {highvalue:true})) WHERE NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r) = 'GetChanges') AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r) = 'GetChangesAll') AND NOT m = n RETURN p

queries.name: Paths to VMs excluding tier 0 (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a)-[*1..3]->(b:AZVM)) WHERE a<>b AND (NOT a.tier0 OR a.tier0 IS NULL) RETURN p

queries.name: Paths to key vaults excluding tier 0 (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a)-[*1..3]->(b:AZKeyVault)) WHERE a<>b AND (NOT a.tier0 OR a.tier0 IS NULL) RETURN p

queries.name: Paths to ressource groups excluding tier 0 (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a)-[*1..3]->(b:AZResourceGroup)) WHERE a<>b AND (NOT a.tier0 OR a.tier0 IS NULL) RETURN p

queries.name: Paths to subscriptions excluding tier 0 (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a)-[*1..3]->(b:AZSubscription)) WHERE a<>b AND (NOT a.tier0 OR a.tier0 IS NULL) RETURN p

queries.name: Owners of groups

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n)-[:AZOwns]->(:AZGroup) RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from principals without an Azure role but the RBAC role User Access Administrator to resources (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (u)-[:AZUserAccessAdministrator]->(t) WHERE NOT EXISTS((u)-[:AZMemberOf|AZHasRole*1..10]->(:AZRole)) RETURN u, p

queries.name: Paths from guests to valueable objects (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a {usertype:'Guest'})-[*1..3]->(b {highvalue: true})) WHERE a<>b RETURN p

queries.name: Service principals with MS Graph app role assignments

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a:AZServicePrincipal)-[]->(b:AZServicePrincipal) WHERE b.name STARTS WITH 'MICROSOFT GRAPH@' RETURN p

queries.name: Direct controllers of MS Graph

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n)-[:AZAddOwner|AZAddSecret|AZAppAdmin|AZCloudAppAdmin|AZMGAddOwner|AZMGAddSecret|AZOwns]->(g:AZServicePrincipal {appdisplayname: "Microsoft Graph"}) RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest path to MS Graph (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH (n) WHERE NOT n.displayname='Microsoft Graph' WITH n MATCH p = shortestPath((n)-[*1..10]->(g:AZServicePrincipal {appdisplayname: 'Microsoft Graph'})) WHERE n<>g RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest path from owned users to service principals

queryList.query: MATCH (u:AZUser {owned: true}), (m:AZServicePrincipal) MATCH p = shortestPath((u)-[*..]->(m)) RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest path from owned users to managed identities

queryList.query: MATCH (u:AZUser {owned: true}), (m:AZServicePrincipal {serviceprincipaltype: 'ManagedIdentity'}) MATCH p = shortestPath((u)-[*..]->(m)) RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest path from all users to managed identities

queryList.query: MATCH (u:AZUser), (m:AZServicePrincipal {serviceprincipaltype: 'ManagedIdentity'}) MATCH p = shortestPath((u)-[*..]->(m)) RETURN p

queries.name: All service principals

queryList.query: MATCH (sp:AZServicePrincipal) RETURN sp

queries.name: All managed identities

queryList.query: MATCH (sp:AZServicePrincipal {serviceprincipaltype: 'ManagedIdentity'}) RETURN sp

queries.name: Users in valueable roles synced from on-prem (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (u {onpremsyncenabled: true})-[:AZHasRole|AZMemberOf*1..10]->(r:AZRole) WHERE r.highvalue RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from users synced from on-prem to high value targets (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((u:AZUser {onpremsyncenabled: true})-[r*1..10]->(n {highvalue: true})) WHERE u<>n RETURN p

queries.name: Users synced from on-prem

queryList.query: MATCH (u {onpremsyncenabled: true}) RETURN u

queries.name: Groups synced from on-prem

queryList.query: MATCH (g:AZGroup {onpremsyncenabled: true}) RETURN g

queries.name: Users related to AAD Connect

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE toUpper(u.name) STARTS WITH 'MSOL_' RETURN u UNION MATCH (u:AZUser) WHERE toUpper(u.userprincipalname) STARTS WITH 'SYNC_' RETURN u
